meta.title: Humble battery systems for Production Managers | Humble
meta.description: Silent battery power for efficient productions. Eliminate generator drama and keep productions on schedule.

hero.title: Power Efficient Productions Anywhere
hero.description: No refueling. No noise. More power than a 7000 watt generator. 60A silent power eliminates generator logistics and keeps your production on schedule. No permits, no noise complaints, no limits.

items.title: Get Approved for Impossible Locations
items.description: Hotels, rooftops, retail spaces, historic buildings. Silent operation means yes from venues that always say no to generators.

items.title: Eliminate Generator Logistics
items.description: No fuel runs, no fire watch, no permits. Your crew focuses on production, not power management. Faster setup and wrap times.

items.title: Keep Productions on Schedule
items.description: Under 5 minutes to power on. Zero noise complaints. Zero refueling delays. Your production stays on track without generator drama.

items.title: Silent Approval
items.description: Zero emissions, zero noise. Indoor-approved power opens previously impossible venues. Say yes to locations that prohibit generators.

items.title: True Cost Savings
items.description: Cost-competitive with generators once you factor in permits, fuel, fire watch, and crew time. Transparent rental pricing includes delivery, pickup, and backup generator.

items.title: White-Glove Service
items.description: Humble handles delivery, placement, and pickup. You don't touch it. Your crew focuses on production, not managing power logistics.

items.title: Real Power
items.description: 60A Bates out plus three 20A Edison circuits. Power full lighting packages, monitors, and equipment simultaneously without compromise.
